korean: 시원한 바람을 맞으며 페달을 밟으니 상쾌했어.
앞으로 날 좋은 날엔 자주 타야겠다.
english: The weather was nice, so I commuted by bike.
It was refreshing to pedal while feeling the cool breeze.
It's killing two birds with one stone - exercising and saving on transportation costs.
I should ride more often on nice days from now on.
